item.title: Drag, Drop, Review
item.dc:creator: Nathan Ziarek
item.content:encoded:
If you are doing iPhone UI design, Review is the quickest way to judge your mockups on an actual device. Review will accurately display your mockups on both Retina and older displays.
via getreviewapp.com

The app itself is a great way to quickly review mockups directly on your iOS device, but it's the magnifying loupe that makes this link worthy.
